title: Meta and Licensing!
content:
Hey guys,  
I want to buy 4 weights of Meta but Fontfont licesing only allows me to use it for 5 users (basic licensing). The advanced licensing (25 users) is double the cost! Thats $300+. Is there any other place that sells Meta with a much better licensing without the added costs?

Thanks.
author: •Prakash Nair

comments.content:
No, the license comes with the font. Resellers who also sell Meta sell it with the FontFont license.

Pieter
Prakash it might be worth calling Fontshop and speaking to a representative about your situation. How many seats do you need it for? If you do the math the per seat cost is still very affordable.
Na its ok. I'd rather just buy the advanced since we might need more in the future. Thanks though.
